Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Chart: Center MoM bars at 0 for consistent visual baseline

Modified the month-over-month Y-axis to always be centered at 0:
- Added getMoMDomain() function to calculate symmetric axis range
- Ensures equal spacing above and below the 0 baseline
- Positive changes always extend upward from center
- Negative changes always extend downward from center
- Adds 10% padding for visual breathing room

This creates a consistent visual perspective across all economic indicators, making it easier to compare relative changes at a glance.
